overview: They were the best of friends, neighbors who had grown-up together. There was handsome Ted, cute Matt and sexy Sandy, who couldn't get enough. Always included in the group was hot and sensual Anthony, the stud on the block. He could always be seen with the punk-rocker Paul. They were truly the best of friends and could not be pulled apart... even when a new boy arrived on the block!
tagline: They were special friends and no-one could pull them apart...
title: The Boys on the Block
